 Automatic Extension of VNPT program ending on 30 th November, 2013 (KN145 package). Time : From 18 th November, 2013 to 30 th November, 2013 Eligibility : Post-paid subscriber Location : All centers 1. Eligibility: &#183;Post-paid subscriber having the promotion package of the program Gia hạn tự động KM VNPT tháng 11/2012 which is active or re-active subscriber after being blocked one-way or two-way communication &#183; NOT ELIGIBLE for operational subscriber, rental subscriber, trial subscriber and subscriber under "	"Chăm sóc khách hàng nội bộ."	" program. 2. Content: a. Extension confirmation: from 18 th to 30 th November, 2013, eligible subscribers (regardless of cycle types) will receive a message informing about the automatic extension of the promotion. After that, &#183; If customer disagrees to extend : compose HUY_GH and send to 999 then compose Y to confirm (from 18 th to 30 th November, 2013) >> Subscriber will receive the benefits of the current promotion until 30 th November, 2013 . &#183; If customer does not cancel the extension: the promotion program will automatically extend and exchange the package used until 30 th November, 2014 b. Content Program code 135415 Current promotional package used until 30 th November, 2013 KN129 Automatically extended package used until 30 th November, 2014 KN145 Fee (not including monthly subscription fee) VND145.000/Cycle Benefits (voice call) Regulations Free first 10 minutes/phone call (from the 1 st to 600 th second) From the 601 st of the call: charged as normal rate. Free minutes 1500 minutes/ Cycle Application scope On-net, Vinaphone and fixed VNPT number in Viet Nam To check the balance Compose KT_KN to 999 c. Cancellation from 1 st November, 2013 (after automatic extension of this program): &#183;To manually cancel: send 2 messages: oCancellation message: HUY_KN to 999 . oConfirmation message after receiving a response: Y to 999 &#183;Subscribers which terminate the service within the promotional period in the following cases will be charged for the days of using the program >> the program will expire immediately. oSwitch to Pre-paid subscriber. oCancel/Stop Post-paid subscription oTransfer ownership. oSend cancellation message &#183;After cancellation, customer will not be able to register again. d. Upgrading the VNPT packages: see more at Quy định chi tiết 3. Regulations: &#183;The benefits are applied within 1 cycle, and will not be reserved if not finished. &#183;The promotional services will not be taken as Loyalty Program accumulating points. &#183;Subscribers under this promotion cannot join other promotions unless those promotions are regulated differently (subscribers can join those promotion as well), and will receive the highest value of benefits according to each program’s regulation. &#183;During the program, two-way blocked subscribers which are reactivated will receive the promotion from the reactivation time until 30 th November, 2014. &#33258;&#21160;&#24310;&#26399; 2013 &#24180; 11 &#26376;30&#26085;&#32467;&#26463; &#30340;VNPT&#27963;&#21160;&#65288; KN145&#22871;&#39184;&#65289; &#20248;&#24800;&#26102;&#38388;&#65306; &#20174; 2013&#24180;11&#26376;18&#26085; SMS &#65306; 999 &#12395; HUY_KN &#12434;&#36865;&#20449;&#12377;&#12427; MobiFone &#12363;&#12425; SMS &#12364;&#23626;&#12367;&#12392;&#12289; 999 &#12395; Y &#12434; &#36865;&#20449; &#12377;&#12427; &#53076;&#46300; 135415 2013 &#45380; 11 &#50900; 30 &#51068;&#44620;&#51648; &#54812;&#53469;&#51012; &#48155;&#51012; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228; KN129 2014 &#45380; 11 &#50900; 30 &#51068;&#44620;&#51648; &#51088;&#46041; &#50672;&#51109;&#46112; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228; KN145 &#44032;&#51077;&#48708; ( &#44592;&#48376;&#47308; &#54252;&#54632;&#54616;&#51648; &#50506;&#51020; 145.000 &#46041; / &#51452;&#44592; (1 &#52488;&#45817; ) &#47924;&#47308; &#53685;&#54868;&#47049; 1500 ph?t/ CK 1500 &#48516; / &#51452;&#44592; &#51201;&#50857;&#48276;&#50948; Mobifone &#45236;&#48512; &#45348;&#50892;&#53356; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228; ,Vinaphone &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#50640;&#44172; ( &#52265;&#49888;&#54616;&#44144;&#45208; &#47196;&#48141;&#54624; &#46412;&#46020; ), &#51204;&#44397;&#51032; VNPT &#44256;&#51221;&#51204;&#54868;&#50640;&#44172; (Gphone &#47581;&#51032; &#48264;&#54840;&#46308; &#54252;&#54632; ) &#45224;&#50500;&#51080;&#45716; &#45936;&#51060;&#53552;&#50857;&#47049;&#51012; &#54869;&#51064;&#54624; &#44221;&#50864; : KT KN &#47928;&#51088;&#47484; &#51089;&#49457;&#54644;&#49436; 999 &#48264;&#51004;&#47196; &#48372;&#45236;&#54632; c. 2013 &#45380; 12 &#50900; 01 &#51068;&#48512;&#53552; &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#50640; &#44032;&#51077;&#51012; &#52712;&#49548; : ( &#51088;&#46041; &#50672;&#51109;&#46108; &#54980;&#50640; ). &#44256;&#44061;&#45784;&#51008; &#52572;&#49548;&#47484; &#54616;&#44256; &#49910;&#51012; &#44221;&#50864;&#50640; &#45796;&#51020;&#44284; &#44057;&#51008; &#47928;&#51088; &#47700;&#49884;&#51648; 2 &#44148;&#51012; &#48372;&#45236;&#50556; &#54620;&#45796; &#52712;&#49548;&#47928;&#51088; : HUY_KN &#47928;&#51088; &#47700;&#49884;&#51648;&#47484; &#51089;&#49457;&#54616;&#50668; 999 &#47196; &#48372;&#45240;&#45796; &#52712;&#49548;&#47484; &#54869;&#51064;&#54624; &#47928;&#51088;&#47484; &#48372;&#45236;&#50556; &#54620;&#45796; : Y &#47928;&#51088; &#47700;&#49884;&#51648;&#47484; &#51089;&#49457;&#54616;&#50668; 999 &#47196; &#48372;&#45240;&#45796; .( &#52712;&#49548;&#54620; &#54980;&#50640; &#51116;&#44032;&#51077; &#48520;&#44032;&#45733;&#54620;&#45796; ). &#45796;&#51020;&#44284; &#44057;&#51060; &#44221;&#50864;&#50640; &#52712;&#49548;&#54616;&#49884; &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#50640; &#52280;&#44032; &#52712;&#49548;&#54624; &#46412;&#45716; &#48708;&#50857;&#51060; &#49892;&#51228; &#49324;&#50857;&#54620; &#51068;&#49688;&#50640; &#46384;&#46972; &#48512;&#44284;&#46121;&#45768; &#45796; . &#48148;&#47196; &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#51032; &#54812;&#53469;&#51012; &#48155;&#51012; &#49688; &#50630;&#45796; &#49440; / &#54980;&#48520; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228;&#47196; &#51204;&#54872; &#54980;&#48520; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228; &#49325;&#51228; &#44228;&#50557;&#51088; &#48320;&#44221; &#52712;&#49548;&#47928;&#51088;&#47484; &#48372;&#45236;&#44592; &#52712;&#49548;&#54620; &#54980;&#50640; &#51116;&#44032;&#51077; &#48520;&#44032;&#45733;&#54620;&#45796; . d. &#50836;&#44552;&#51228; &#50629;&#44536;&#47112;&#46300; : &#49464;&#48512;&#44508;&#51221; &#50640; &#52280;&#44256;&#54620;&#45796; 3. &#44508;&#51221; : &#54812;&#53469;&#51008; &#45817;&#44592; &#51452;&#44592;&#50640; &#51201;&#50857;&#51060; &#46112; &#44163;&#51060;&#45796; . &#45817;&#44592; &#51452;&#44592;&#50640; &#54812;&#53469;&#51012; &#45796; &#51060;&#50857;&#54616;&#51648; &#50506;&#51012; &#44221;&#50864;&#50640; &#45224;&#50500;&#51080;&#45716; &#54812;&#53469;&#51008; &#49548;&#47736;&#46112; &#44163;&#51060;&#45796; &#48155;&#51012; &#54812;&#53469;&#51008; &#50864;&#47049;&#44256;&#44061; &#50864;&#45824; &#54532;&#47196;&#44536;&#47016;&#51032; &#51201;&#47549;&#51216;&#49688;&#47196; &#44228;&#49328;&#46104;&#51648; &#50506;&#45716;&#45796; . &#44256;&#44061;&#45784;&#51008; &#51060; &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#50752; &#45796;&#47480; &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#50640; &#46041;&#49884; &#52280;&#50668;&#54616;&#47732; &#50504; &#46121;&#45768;&#45796; ( &#45796;&#47480; &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#51032; &#53945;&#48324;&#54620;&#44508;&#51221;&#51060; ( &#45796;&#47480; &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#50640; &#52280;&#44032; &#44032;&#45733;&#54620; &#45236;&#50857; ) &#51080;&#51004;&#47732; &#46121;&#45768;&#45796; . &#46608;&#45716; &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#51032; &#44508;&#51221;&#50640; &#46384;&#46972;&#49436; &#51228;&#51068; &#53360; &#54812;&#53469;&#44032; &#51080;&#45716; &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#47484; &#48155;&#51012; &#49688; &#51080;&#45796; . &#48156;&#49888;&#51060;&#45208; &#49688;&#49888; &#51060; &#51221;&#51648;&#46104;&#44256; &#51080;&#45716; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228; , &#48156; &#49888; &#48143; &#49688;&#49888; &#51060; &#44032;&#45733;&#54616;&#45716; &#50836;&#44552;&#51228; &#45716; &#51060;&#48292;&#53944;&#51032; &#53685;&#48372; &#47928;&#51088;&#47700;&#49884;&#51648;&#47484; &#48155;&#51012; &#49688; &#50630;&#44592; &#46412;&#47928;&#50640; &#48373;&#44396;&#54620; &#54980;&#50640; 2014 &#45380; 11 &#50900; 30 &#51068;&#44620;&#51648; &#44228;&#49549; &#54812;&#53469;&#51012; &#48155;&#51012; &#49688; &#51080;&#45796; . &#6036;&#6035;&#6098;&#6031;&#6026;&#6084;&#6041;&#6047;&#6098;&#6044;&#6096;&#6041;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6044;&#6031;&#6098;&#6031;&#6071; &#6036;&#6030;&#6098;&#6031;&#6070;&#6016;&#6040;&#6098; &#6040;&#6044;&#6071;&#6034;&#6072; VNPT &#6050; &#6047;&#6091;&#6050;&#6070;&#6033;&#6071;&#6039;&#6070;&#6038; 30/11/2013 (&#6016;&#6025;&#6098;&#6021;&#6036;&#6091; KN145). &#6044;&#6081;&#6043;&#6070;&#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035; &#6102; &#6038;&#6072;&#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083; 18/11/2013​ &#6026;&#6043;&#6091;&#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083; 30/11/2013 &#6050;&#6035;&#6075;&#6044;&#6031;&#6098;&#6031;&#6047;&#6086;&#6042;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6050;&#6098;&#6035;&#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078; &#6102; &#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6036;&#6020;&#6091;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6021;&#6070;&#6086;&#6017;&#6082; &#6033;&#6072;&#6016;&#6035;&#6098;&#6043;&#6082;&#6020;&#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035; &#6102; &#6016;&#6098;&#6042;&#6075;&#6040;&#6048;&#6090;&#6075;&#6035;&#6033;&#6070;&#6086;&#6020;&#6040;&#6076;&#6043; 1. &#6047;&#6040;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6050;&#6098;&#6035;&#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6102; ​ &#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6050;&#6098;&#6035;&#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6036;&#6020;&#6091;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6070;&#6016;&#6091;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6021;&#6070;&#6086;&#6017;&#6082;&#6031;&#6098; VNPT &#6017;&#6082;11/2012 &#6016;&#6086;&#6038;&#6075;&#6020;&#6035;&#6085;&#6026;&#6086;&#6030;&#6078;&#6042;&#6016;&#6070;&#6042;/&#6036;&#6020;&#6098;&#6017;&#6070;&#6086;&#6020;01&#6017;&#6070;&#6020;/ &#6036;&#6020;&#6098;&#6017;&#6070;&#6086;&#6020;02 &#6017;&#6070;&#6020;&#6036;&#6078;&#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6049;&#6078;&#6020;&#6044;&#6071;&#6025;&#6102;​ &#6040;&#6071;&#6035; ​​ &#6031;&#6070;&#6040;&#6016;&#6070;&#6042;&#6016;&#6086;&#6030;&#6031;&#6091;&#6023;&#6070;&#6034;&#6042;&#6040;&#6070;&#6035;&#6100; &#6021;&#6086;&#6035;&#6077;&#6035;&#6044;&#6081;&#6043;&#6070;&#6053;&#6031;&#6018;&#6071;&#6031;&#6032;&#6098;&#6043;&#6083;​ 1500 &#6035;&#6070;&#6033;&#6072;/&#6044;&#6018;&#6098;&#6018; >>&#6016;&#6070;&#6042;&#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6035;&#6073;&#6020; &#6050;&#6047;&#6091;&#6047;&#6075;&#6038;&#6043;&#6039;&#6070;&#6038;&#6039;&#6098;&#6043;&#6070;&#6040;&#6100; &#6100; &#6016;&#6098;&#6042;&#6084;&#6041;&#6038;&#6081;&#6043;&#6037;&#6098;&#6026;&#6070;&#6021;&#6091;&#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6018;&#6074;&#6050;&#6031;&#6071;&#6032;&#6071;&#6023;&#6035; VNPT&#6102; &#6040;&#6078;&#6043; Quy định chi tiết 3. &#6016;&#6070;&#6042;&#6016;&#6086;&#6030;&#6031;&#6091;&#6102;​ &#6042;&#6070;&#6043;&#6091;&#6050;&#6070;&#6033;&#6071;&#6039;&#6070;&#6038;&#6050;&#6035;&#6075;&#6031;&#6098;&#6031;&#6031;&#6082;&#6016;&#6098;&#6035;&#6075;&#6020;&#6040;&#6077;&#6041;&#6044;&#6018;&#6098; &#6018;, &#6040;&#6071;&#6035;&#6036;&#6070;&#6035;&#6042;&#6016;&#6098;&#6047;&#6070;&#6033;&#6075;&#6016;&#6036;&#6078;&#6047;&#6071;&#6035;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6040;&#6071;&#6035;&#6050;&#6047;&#6091;&#6100; &#6036;&#6030;&#6098;&#6026;&#6070;&#6016;&#6086;&#6042;&#6071;&#6031;&#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6040;&#6071;&#6035;&#6036;&#6070;&#6035;&#6018;&#6071;&#6031;&#6023;&#6070;&#6038;&#6071; &#6035;&#6098;&#6033;&#6075;&#6047;&#6035;&#6098;&#6047;&#6086;&#6042;&#6036;&#6047;&#6091;&#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6044;&#6071;&#6034;&#6072;&#6031;&#6039;&#6098;&#6023;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6041;&#6076; &#6050;&#6020;&#6098;&#6044;&#6082;&#6020; ( KNDL ) &#6100;​ &#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6021;&#6076;&#6043;&#6042;&#6077;&#6040;&#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6044;&#6071;&#6034;&#6072;&#6035;&#6081;&#6087;&#6040;&#6071;&#6035;&#6050;&#6070; &#6021;&#6021;&#6076;&#6043;&#6042;&#6077;&#6040;&#6036;&#6030;&#6098;&#6026;&#6070;&#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6044;&#6071;&#6034;&#6072;&#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6037;&#6098;&#6047;&#6081; &#6020; &#6043;&#6078;&#6016;&#6043;&#6082;&#6020;&#6038;&#6081;&#6043;&#6040;&#6070;&#6035;&#6043;&#6071;&#6017;&#6071;&#6031;&#6021;&#6098;&#6036;&#6070;&#6036;&#6091;&#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076; &#6035;&#6035;&#6084;&#6087;&#6016;&#6086;&#6030;&#6031;&#6091;&#6037;&#6098;&#6047;&#6081;&#6020;(&#6016;&#6070;&#6042;&#6016;&#6086;&#6030;&#6031;&#6091;&#6036;&#6070;&#6035;&#6021;&#6076; &#6043;&#6042;&#6077;&#6040;)&#6100;​&#6048;&#6078;&#6041;&#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6035;&#6073;&#6020;&#6033;&#6033;&#6077;&#6043; &#6036;&#6070;&#6035;&#6016;&#6070;&#6042;&#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6042;&#6036;&#6047;&#6091;&#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6044;&#6071;&#6034;&#6072;&#6040;&#6070;&#6035;&#6016;&#6086; &#6042;&#6071;&#6031;&#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6034;&#6086;&#6036;&#6086;&#6037;&#6075;&#6031;&#6035;&#6071;&#6020;&#6031;&#6070;&#6040;&#6016;&#6070;&#6042;&#6016;&#6086;&#6030;&#6031;&#6091; &#6042;&#6036;&#6047;&#6091;&#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6044;&#6071;&#6034;&#6072;&#6100; &#6016;&#6098;&#6035;&#6075;&#6020;&#6044;&#6081;&#6043;&#6070;&#6021;&#6076;&#6043;&#6042;&#6077;&#6040;&#6016;&#6040;&#6098;&#6040;&#6044;&#6071;&#6034;&#6072; &#6036;&#6030;&#6098;&#6026;&#6070;&#6043;&#6081;&#6017;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6031;&#6098;&#6042;&#6076;&#6044;&#6036;&#6020;&#6098;&#6017;&#6070;&#6086;&#6020; 02 &#6017;&#6070;&#6020; &#6038;&#6081;&#6043;&#6036;&#6078;&#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6044;&#6071;&#6025; &#6036;&#6070;&#6035;&#6036;&#6035;&#6098;&#6031;&#6033;&#6033;&#6077;&#6043;&#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035; &#6035;&#6084;&#6087;&#6044;&#6081;&#6043;&#6070;&#6033;&#6033;&#6077;&#6043;&#6032;&#6082;&#6040;&#6023;&#6076;&#6035;&#6018;&#6071;&#6031;&#6038;&#6072;&#6044;&#6081;&#6043;&#6070;&#6036;&#6078; &#6016;&#6036;&#6098;&#6042;&#6078;&#6044;&#6071;&#6025;&#6026;&#6043;&#6091;&#6050;&#6047;&#6091;&#6032;&#6098;&#6020;&#6083; 30/11/2014.​ &#6100;​
